alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 10:41AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois... Kaskaskia River at Carlyle TW. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kaskaskia River at Carlyle TW. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 424.5 feet, Some cabins just below the dam are inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 425.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday was 425.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 425.1 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 423.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Kaskaskia River Carlyle TW 423.5 425.0 Tue 10 am 425.0 425.0 425.0 425.0 425. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
